text: I finally got around to submitting this to the Ideas section on the Community and would appreciate some upvotes! If you set a negative margin on a column in a drag-and-drop theme, it becomes impossible for the content editor to ever click into or update that column: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Drag-and-drop-themes-ability-to-click-into-columns-with-negative/idi-p/387062>
Upvoted. We make overlapping designs all the time.
